scripts.deploy:blog: git subtree split --prefix=Frontend/blog.fahrnbach.one -b deploy-blog && git push blog deploy-blog:main && git branch -D deploy-blog
scripts.deploy:home: git subtree split --prefix=Frontend/fahrnbach.one -b deploy-home && git push blog deploy-home:main && git branch -D deploy-home
scripts.dev:sesame: test -f Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/.wrangler/state/v3/r2/sesame-data-preview/data.json && cp Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/data.json Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/.wrangler/state/v3/r2/sesame-data-preview/data.json && npx wrangler dev --local --config Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/wrangler.toml || npx wrangler dev --remote --config Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/wrangler.toml
scripts.stage:sesame: npx wrangler r2 object put sesame-data-preview/data.json --file Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/data.json --remote --config Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/wrangler.toml && npx wrangler dev --remote --config Frontend/sesame.fahrnbach.one/sesame-meta-worker/wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:resume: npm run upload:resume && npx wrangler deploy --config Frontend/resume.fahrnbach.one/resume-meta-worker/wrangler.toml
